name: Initium (pinkivic)
description:
This game was made for the 2021 unreal engine megajam

it was made in UE5 so  you will need a pretty strong computer to run it.

I used Blockbench for the modeling and texturing (it was my first time using this software and it was really cool).

Blender for the rigging and animating.

BfXr for the sound effect.

non-original assets;

The music "Underclocked" was made by Eric Skiff

The laser beam sound was made by unfa; Freesound - "Weapons Beam Loop" by unfa
